description: Misae Sagara is the resident manager at Youhei`s dorm. She was a student council president when she was in high school. Misae is friendly with the dorm students but strict when it comes to the dorm rules. She is also well-liked by the rugby members. Depending on decisions, Tomoya can change her to a violent dorm lady through his lecture, which is her original personality, who uses brute force to convince the dorm students to do their cleaning duty.
name: Sagara Misae
